main.name: Sam Sharma
main.bio: My name is Sam, I'm a Full Stack MERN Developer. I'm currently working on a personal project - PurrPals-A social network for cat lovers.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skills -

education.degree: Diploma in Computing Studies and Information Systems.
education.description: A few of the courses completed - Intro to programming I & II, Data Structures and Algorithms, Software Engineering, System Analysis & Design, Advanced JS and Ajax, Web Server Scripting, Database I & II, Network and Security.

work.title: Crew Member (Area Leader)
work.description: Greeting customers, recommending food items, collecting payments, promoting special deals, operating various tools and equipment to prepare food, maintaining cleanliness, and ensuring quality control.

work.title: Warehouse Worker
work.description: Loading and unloading containers while following proper safety procedures

projects.title: IT Helpdesk Ticketing System.
projects.category: Developed at Douglas College for the final project for the Software Engineering course using JAVA, hibernate ORM and sql for the database.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.category: Simple snake game developed using React.js and deployed using Heroku

projects.title: Covid-19 Tracker
projects.category: Tracker for COVID-19 virus using react.js and graph.js and deployed with Heroku.

projects.title: Weather App

projects.title: To Do List

projects.title: RGB Game

projects.title: Yelp Camp
projects.category: YelpCamp is a campground reviewing website. Users can create their own campgrounds or review others' campgrounds. (Web dev bootcamp - Colt Steele)

projects.title: Dental 360

projects.title: Image Gallery

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
